languages.text: "Простые люди не всегда знают, кто ими правит. Уверена, на корабле Вольного Торговца еще не все знают, что Теодора мертва".

traits.locale_text: "Простые люди не всегда знают, кто ими правит. Уверена, на корабле Вольного Торговца еще не все знают, что Теодора мертва".

languages.text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."
languages.original_text: "Простые люди не всегда знают, кто ими правит. Уверена, на корабле Вольного Торговца еще не все знают, что Теодора мертва".

traits.locale_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."
"The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."
"The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."
"The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."
"The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."
"The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."

languages.text: 「自分たちを誰が支配しているのかを、民衆が常に理解しているとは限りません。ローグトレーダーの船内ですら、未だにシオドーラ様の死を知らぬ者がいるに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."

traits.locale_text: 「自分たちを誰が支配しているのかを、民衆が常に理解しているとは限りません。ローグトレーダーの船内ですら、未だにシオドーラ様の死を知らぬ者がいるに違いありません」

languages.text: "Die einfachen Bürger wissen nicht immer, wer über sie herrscht. Es gibt an Bord des Schiffs {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sicher einige, die noch nicht von Theodoras Tod wissen."
languages.original_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."

traits.locale_text: "Die einfachen Bürger wissen nicht immer, wer über sie herrscht. Es gibt an Bord des Schiffs {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sicher einige, die noch nicht von Theodoras Tod wissen."

languages.text: « Le petit peuple ne sait pas toujours qui le dirige. Je suis sûre qu'il y a encore des personnes à bord du vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} qui ignorent que Théodora est morte. »
languages.original_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."

traits.locale_text: « Le petit peuple ne sait pas toujours qui le dirige. Je suis sûre qu'il y a encore des personnes à bord du vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} qui ignorent que Théodora est morte. »

languages.text: «El pueblo llano no siempre conoce a sus dirigentes. Seguro que aún hay personas a bordo de la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente que no se han enterado de la muerte de Theodora».
languages.original_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."

traits.locale_text: «El pueblo llano no siempre conoce a sus dirigentes. Seguro que aún hay personas a bordo de la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente que no se han enterado de la muerte de Theodora».

languages.text: “很多时候，普通人并不清楚他们的统治者是谁。我相信即便是现在，这艘船上也有很多人并不清楚西奥多拉已经去世了。”
languages.original_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."

traits.locale_text: “很多时候，普通人并不清楚他们的统治者是谁。我相信即便是现在，这艘船上也有很多人并不清楚西奥多拉已经去世了。”

languages.text: "Halk, baştakileri tanımıyor bile olabilir. Hatta Hür Tacir'in gemisinde olup da Theodora'nın ölümünden bihaber olan varsa şaşırmam."
languages.original_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."

traits.locale_text: "Halk, baştakileri tanımıyor bile olabilir. Hatta Hür Tacir'in gemisinde olup da Theodora'nın ölümünden bihaber olan varsa şaşırmam."

languages.original_text: "The common people do not always know who rules them. I am sure there are some aboard the Rogue Trader's ship who still do not know about Theodora's death."
